title: LAAAAAG
body: Anyone else getting hard core lag spikes recently?

replies.body: Completely unplayable. Will be avoiding ranked until resolved. Another TPG issue?

Decided to spectate a game tonight to see if there were issues.

Still MASSIVE lag tonight, even in spectate mode.

It is unplayable for me again tonight.

looks like kids in NA are also being impacted, suggestion is that it is the new patch

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/arBAXcGp-new-515-patch-lag

Yeah i installed the patch after a few days of not playing league and i cannot get my usual 35-40 constant stable ping. With only league open and nothing else, no one in the house using the net at all (i asked lol) i keep getting between 70-160 and it just spikes up and and down all game, and its never stable at all. Thank god i tried a normal first but glad im not the only one this is happening too.
Yeah I was blaming everyone else first (downloaders streamers too many devices connected syncing devices etc)  but I eliminated all sources and still had game breaking lag.
i got dc'ed by my kettle lmao
yeeeeah sort of. ill say there is just so riot might have a chance of finally doing something instead of releasing more useless chroma packs
